Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLWindowContainerView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.ContainerView
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLWindowContainerView
public class SLWindowContainerView
extends ContainerView
Subclass of ContainerView that's used to make an SLWindow's background and border have that stone-texture look. This class needs to be accessed outside of here because one may want to customize the background color or image.

SLWindowContainerView(SLWindow)

cursorForPoint(int, int)
Returns the appropriate resize cursor for the four corners.
mouseDown(MouseEvent)
Starts a window drag or resize if the user presses in the border.
mouseDragged(MouseEvent)
Moves or resizes the window.
